      • run

        public boolean run(java.util.Scanner scan)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Used to read the Solid's height and the Base shape's info
        Specified by:
        run in interface DataReader
        Parameters:
        scan - Simple Scanner built form the InputStream passed though the InputHandler.InputHandler(InputStream) constructor called by the subclasses to read inputs easier.
        Returns:
        When this method returns false it'll be printed InputHandler.errorMessage
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - It's threw whenever the input phase need to print a different error message.
        See Also:
        DataReader, InputHandler
